name: Fingarush
description: Fingarush is a game designed and developed by Daries Media. It's a unique game that test the player's problem solving skill through image/numbers recognition with time limits and unlimited attempts. At the top of the game you will find the 'Timer', 'G-0' (total clicks to be made) and 'Hints' (for assistance/reminder of what to click). It's a unique game that test the player's problem solving skill through image/numbers recognition with time limits and unlimited attempts.
